p: VLPs of NoVs were first produced in insect cells using baculovirus vectors [ 23, 104] and then in plants using tobamovirus [ 101] and geminivirus [ 102] vectors and in mammalian cells using the Venezuelan equine encephalitis (VEE) replicon system [ 105]. These studies demonstrated that expression of the major capsid protein VP1 alone can drive the self-assembly of VLPs that morphologically and antigenically resemble native virus particles (Fig. 8.1). VLPs generated by all three expression systems are similar to each other.
